DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to asses the effect of Bifidobacterium lactis and Inulin on functional constipation in children
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Bifidobacterium Lactis and Inulin on Functional Constipation
DOC.criteria: children with functional constipation over 3 years age below 18 years of age Chronic gastrointestinal disease, hirschsprung disease, celiac disease, hypothyroids, neurological deficit, constipation treatment receiving children will be excluded
